active.name: Plant
active.effect: Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a 1400 radius to your team. Lasts 6 minutes.Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

active.name: Replenish
active.effect: Grants 6 mana regeneration to the target for 30 seconds.If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

active.name: Disguise
active.effect: Turns the caster and all allied player-controlled units in a 1200 radius invisible, and grants 15% bonus movement speed for 35 seconds.Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility.Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.

active.name: Eat Mango
active.effect: Instantly restores 100 mana.

active.name: Imbue
active.effect: Instantly restores 85 health.

active.name: Plant
active.effect: Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a  radius.Lasts 8 minutes.Does not grant ground vision.Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

active.name: Enlighten
active.effect: Grants you 700 experience plus 135 per tome consumed by your team after the first two.

notes.title: Bonus Experience Gained per Previous Tome

active.name: Reveal
active.effect: Reveals and slows invisible heroes by 20% in a 1050 radius around the caster for 12 seconds.

active.name: Devour
active.effect: Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.Comes with 3 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

active.name: Teleport
active.effect: After channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building.Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

active.name: Salve
active.effect: Grants 40 health regeneration to the target for 10 seconds.If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

active.name: Regenerate
active.effect: Consumes a charge to restore 125 health and 75 mana over 2.5 seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

passive.name: Store Rune
passive.effect: Runes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 2 minutes.Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.

passive.name: Ability Upgrade
passive.effect: Upgrades one of your abilities.

active.name: Plant Tree
active.effect: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

active.name: Chop Tree
active.effect: Destroy a target tree.

passive.name: Quell
passive.effect: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 13 for melee heroes, and 6 for ranged.

passive.name: Magical Damage Block
passive.effect: Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 50 damage.Comes with 6 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.

passive.name: Poison Attack
passive.effect: Poisons the target, dealing 2 magical damage per second and slowing movement by 13% if the equipped hero is melee, or by 4% if they are ranged. Lasts for 2 seconds.

passive.name: Lesser Corruption
passive.effect: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 2 for 8 seconds.

passive.name: Pierce
passive.effect: Grants each attack a 30% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.

active.name: Energy Charge
active.effect: Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

notes.title: Health and Mana Restored per Charge

passive.name: Spell Lifesteal
passive.effect: 10% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.Lifesteal reduced to 2% against creeps.

passive.name: True Sight
passive.effect: Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier.

passive.name: Lifesteal
passive.effect: Heals the attacker for 15% of attack damage dealt

active.name: Fade
active.effect: Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as the target unit remains still.Has a 1.25 second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving.There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

active.name: Ghost Form
active.effect: You enter ghost form for 4 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and 40% more vulnerable to magic damage.

active.name: Blink
active.effect: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

active.name: Energy Charge
active.effect: Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

notes.title: Health and Mana Restored per Charge

active.name: Sacrifice
active.effect: Consume 170 health to temporarily gain 150 mana. Lasts 10 seconds.If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.

passive.name: Corrosion
passive.effect: Dealing 3 damage per second, reducing armor by 3, and slowing movement speed by 13% if the equipped hero is melee, or by 4% if they are ranged.Lasts 3 seconds.

active.name: Switch Attribute
active.effect: Switches between +10 Strength, +10 Agility, or +10 Intelligence.

active.name: Phase
active.effect: Gives 20% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 3 seconds.

active.name: Berserk
active.effect: Gives 110 attack speed and 30 movement speed, but reduces your armor by 8 and silences you. Lasts 6 seconds.

passive.name: Lifesteal
passive.effect: Heals the attacker for 20% of attack damage dealt.

active.name: Transmute
active.effect: Kills a non-hero target for 160 gold and 2.1x experience.Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

active.name: Dominate
active.effect: Takes control of one neutral target unit and sets its movement speed to 425 and max health to a minimum of 1000/1800. Also provides the unit with +25 base attack damage, +12 health regen, +4 mana regen and +4 armor.Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1000/1800 retain their original max health.  Dominated unit's bounty is set to 200 gold.

active.name: Dominate
active.effect: Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 425 and max health to a minimum of 1000. Also provides the unit with +25 base attack damage, +12 health regen, +4 mana regen and +4 armor.Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1000 retain their original max health.  Dominated unit's bounty is set to 200 gold.

passive.name: Upgrade: Town Portal Scroll
passive.effect: Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage.

active.name: Consume
active.effect: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 200 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.

passive.name: Shade Sight
passive.effect: Grants 400 bonus night vision.

active.name: Dominate
active.effect: Takes control of one neutral target unit and sets its movement speed to 425 and max health to a minimum of 1800. Also provides the unit with +25 base attack damage, +12 health regen, +4 mana regen and +4 armor.Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1800 retain their original max health.  Dominated unit's bounty is set to 200 gold.

passive.name: Buckler Aura
passive.effect: Grants 2 armor to player units.

passive.name: Regeneration Aura
passive.effect: Grants 2 health regeneration to allies.

passive.name: Basilius Aura
passive.effect: Grants 1.4 mana regeneration to allies.

active.name: Soul Release
active.effect: Provides 30 health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals 25 damage per second when cast on enemies.Lasts 8 seconds.Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

passive.name: Break
passive.effect: Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus 14 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 45 for 13 seconds.

active.name: Valor
active.effect: If cast on an ally, grants them the 5 armor, and removing it from the caster.If cast on an enemy, reduces 5 armor on both the enemy and the caster.Cannot target spell immune enemies.

active.name: Replenish Mana
active.effect: Restores 160 mana to all nearby allies.

active.name: Endurance
active.effect: Gives +45 attack speed and +13% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds.

passive.name: Swiftness Aura
passive.effect: Grants 20 movement speed to allies.

active.name: Restore
active.effect: Heals 275 health to allied units in a 1200 radius.

passive.name: Mekansm Aura
passive.effect: Grants 2 health regeneration to allied units in a 1200 radius.

active.name: Energy Charge
active.effect: Target an allied unit to instantly restore 15 health and mana per charge stored.Max 20 charges. Automatically gains a charge every 15 seconds and whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

notes.title: Health and Mana Restored per Charge

passive.name: Holy Blessing
passive.effect: Amplifies heals you provide by 35%.

passive.name: Vladmir's Aura
passive.effect: Grants 15% lifesteal, 18% bonus damage, 1.4 mana regeneration, and 3 armor to nearby allies.

active.name: Soul Release
active.effect: When used against enemies, it reduces health by 4% of current health per second, and reduces HP regeneration and healing by 45%. Deals 35 damage per second.When used on allies, it provides 40 health regeneration per second.Lasts 8 seconds.Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge.

notes.title: Enemy Current Health as Damage per Second

active.name: Barrier
active.effect: Gives a shield that blocks 400 magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 12 seconds.

passive.name: Insight Aura
passive.effect: Gives allied units 2 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance.

active.name: Mend
active.effect: Restores 300 health and 200 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

passive.name: Guardian Aura
passive.effect: Provides 2.5 health regeneration and 3 armor to allied units. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 16 health regeneration and 10 armor.

active.name: Magic Weakness
active.effect: Cast a 600 radius blast that causes enemies to take 18% increased damage from spells.

passive.name: Basilius Aura
passive.effect: Grants 1.5 mana regeneration to allies.

active.name: Glimmer
active.effect: After a 0.6 second delay, grants invisibility and 45% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for 5 seconds.Can be cast while channelling.

active.name: Demonic Summoning
active.effect: Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.Warrior:Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.Archer:Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at level 3.

active.name: Force
active.effect: Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.

passive.name: Aethereal Focus
passive.effect: Increases targeted spell and item cast range by 250.

passive.name: Witch Blade
passive.effect: Causes your next attack to apply a poison for 3 seconds, slowing by 25% and dealing 1x your intelligence as damage every second.

active.name: Cyclone
active.effect: Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

active.name: Energy Burst
active.effect: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

active.name: Cripple
active.effect: Roots the target for 2 seconds.

active.name: Soul Burn
active.effect: Silences the target unit for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

active.name: Shine
active.effect: When cast on an ally, grants them 8 armor, 80 attack speed, and 10% movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes 8 armor, 80 attack speed, and 10% movement speed.Removes the armor from the caster when used.Cannot target spell immune enemies.

passive.name: Ability Upgrade
passive.effect: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.

active.name: Reset Cooldowns
active.effect: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

passive.name: Cooldown Reduction
passive.effect: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.

active.name: Hex
active.effect: Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.Instantly destroys illusions.

passive.name: Ability Upgrade
passive.effect: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.

active.name: Eternal Chains
active.effect: Roots all enemies in a target 450 radius for 2 seconds and deals 220 damage.

passive.name: Chain Lightning
passive.effect: Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 160 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

active.name: Cyclone
active.effect: Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself, enemy units or allied units.Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

active.name: Barrier
active.effect: Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

passive.name: Damage Block
passive.effect: Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

active.name: Damage Return
active.effect: For 4.5 seconds, the damage returned from all sources is increased by 80%.

passive.name: Damage Return (Passive)
passive.effect: Everytime you are attacked, you return 20 damage plus 20% of the attack damage dealt to you.

passive.name: Combo Breaker
passive.effect: When you take damage and your health falls below 70% a strong dispel is applied and you gain a 2.5 second buff that provides +75% Status Resistance and causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage.

active.name: Shroud
active.effect: Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 400 magical damage, converting damage taken into mana. Lasts 12 seconds.

active.name: Guard
active.effect: For 12 seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings a 100% chance to block 70 damage from each incoming attack.Units may only be affected by Guard once every 39 seconds.

passive.name: Damage Block
passive.effect: Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

active.name: Echo Shell
active.effect: Applies a shield to the target unit for 6 seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell.

active.name: Avatar
active.effect: Grants Spell Immunity Duration decreases with each use.

active.name: Hurricane Thrust
active.effect: Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 5 seconds, allows you to make 4 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed.Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

passive.name: Dragon's Reach
passive.effect: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

active.name: Transfer Spellblock
active.effect: Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for 12 seconds.

passive.name: Spellblock
passive.effect: Blocks most targeted spells once every 12 seconds.

active.name: Mirror Image
active.effect: Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds.Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage.Cooldown increased by 15 seconds on ranged heroes.

active.name: Arctic Blast
active.effect: Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by 40% for 4 seconds.

passive.name: Freezing Aura
passive.effect: Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by 45 and all heals, regeneration and lifesteal by 25%.

passive.name: Assault Aura
passive.effect: Grants 30 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by 5.

active.name: Bloodpact
active.effect: Converts 30% of your max mana to health regeneration over 2 seconds.

passive.name: Mana Battery
passive.effect: Each charge provides 0.2 MP regen and 0.35% Spell Amp. Nearby kills provide 1 charges. Dying causes you to lose 3 charges. Starts with 14 charges.

notes.title: Charge Gain per Enemy Hero Death

passive.name: Critical Strike
passive.effect: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 160% damage.

active.name: Unholy Strength
active.effect: When active, Unholy Strength grants +35 damage, +25 strength and +4 armor, but drains 50 health per second.You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.

passive.name: Bash
passive.effect: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 100 bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

active.name: Shadow Walk
active.effect: Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units.If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus physical damage on that attack.

passive.name: Corruption
passive.effect: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 6 for 7 seconds.

active.name: Chop Tree
active.effect: Destroy a target tree.

passive.name: Quell
passive.effect: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 18 for melee heroes, and 6 for ranged.

active.name: Ether Blast
active.effect: Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and 40% more vulnerable to magic damage. Lasts for 4 seconds on allies and 4 seconds on enemies.Enemy targets are also slowed by 80%, and take 1.5x your primary attribute + 125 as magical damage.

active.name: Nullify
active.effect: Dispels the target and applies a debuff for 5 seconds. Continuously dispels the target. Anytime the target is attacked, it will be slowed by 80% for 0.5 seconds.

passive.name: Pierce
passive.effect: Grants each attack a 75% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.

passive.name: Critical Strike
passive.effect: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 225% damage.

passive.name: Burn
passive.effect: When active, scorches enemies for 60 magical damage per second, and causes them to miss 17% of their attacks. Illusions deal 35 magical damage per second.

active.name: Shadow Walk
active.effect: Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While invisible, you move 25% faster and can move through units.Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 175 bonus physical damage to the target, and disable their passive abilities for 4.

passive.name: True Strike
passive.effect: Your attacks cannot miss.

active.name: Soul Rend
active.effect: Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 30% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and 100% chance to crit for 130% damage.

active.name: Overwhelm
active.effect: Blinks to and stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds.Pierces Spell Immunity.

passive.name: Bash
passive.effect: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 100 bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

passive.name: Dragon's Reach
passive.effect: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

passive.name: Echo Strike
passive.effect: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 0.8 seconds on each strike.

passive.name: Chain Lightning
passive.effect: Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 140 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

active.name: Inhibit
active.effect: Targets an enemy, slowing it for 4 seconds.

passive.name: Manabreak
passive.effect: Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals 0.8 physical damage per burned mana.Burns 16 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.

passive.name: Mage Slayer
passive.effect: Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do 35% less spell damage for 4 seconds.

active.name: Disarm
active.effect: Prevents a target from attacking for 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5 seconds on ranged targets.

active.name: Unholy Rage
active.effect: Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 6 seconds.

passive.name: Lifesteal
passive.effect: Heals the attacker for 25% of attack damage dealt.

passive.name: Cold Attack
passive.effect: Attacks lower enemy movement and attack speed and reduces heals, health regeneration and lifesteal by 40% for 3 seconds. Slows enemy ranged units by 50% movement speed and 50 attack speed. Slows enemy melee units by 25% movement speed and 25 attack speed.

active.name: Static Charge
active.effect: Places a charged shield on a target unit for 15 seconds which has a 20% chance to release a 200 magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.

passive.name: Chain Lightning
passive.effect: Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 170 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

active.name: Arcane Blink
active.effect: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.After teleportation, you gain 25% Ability Cooldown Reduction and 50% Cast Point reduction for 6 seconds.Arcane Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

active.name: Overwhelming Blink
active.effect: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.After teleportation, all enemies in a 800 AoE have 50% movement speed slow and 50 attack speed slow for 6 seconds, and take damage equal to 200 + 100% of your strength.Overwhelming Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

active.name: Swift Blink
active.effect: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.After teleportation, you gain 40% phased movement speed, +50 Attack Speed, and +50 Attack Damage for 6 seconds.Swift Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

passive.name: Reincarnation
passive.effect: Brings you to life with full health and mana 5 seconds after you die, at the location where you died.Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).

passive.effect: Causes attacks to burn the enemy, dealing 18 damage per second for 3 seconds.Affects buildings.

active.effect: Increases your current and maximum health by 400 for 15 seconds.

passive.name: Magic Amp
passive.effect: Reduces magic resistance of the attacked enemy by 12%.

passive.effect: Grants you a bonus 5% movement speed and 15 attack speed anytime one of your abilities are on cooldown.

active.effect: There is no description for this ability.

passive.effect: Lowers enemy Status Resistance by 10% and Magic Resistance by 10%.

passive.effect: Burns enemy units for  damage per second. Illusions deal  damage per second.

passive.effect: Empowers your next attack with 300 bonus magical damage and True Strike.Ranged Attackershave +400 bonus range for the attack.

passive.effect: Amplifies the wearer's Regeneration, Healing, Lifesteal and Spell Lifesteal by 14%.

active.name: Psychic Push
active.effect: Pushes the target enemy unit away from you 400 distance.

passive.name: Cooldown Reduction
passive.effect: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 12%

active.name: Scurry
active.effect: Grants you 24% movement speed and free pathing for 3 seconds. Walking over trees causes them to be destroyed.

active.effect: Dispells debuffs and blinks you to a random spot within 450 range. Does not get disabled on incoming damage.

passive.effect: Each attack has a 20% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by 20% and attack speed by 60 for 3 seconds.

passive.name: Cooldown Reduction
passive.effect: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 18%.

active.name: Active
active.effect: Cyclones your hero for 0.75 seconds.

passive.name: Passive
passive.effect: Zaps an enemy within 700 range, dealing 200 damage and a 40% slow for 0.3 seconds. Strikes every 3 seconds.

passive.name: Prescient Aura
passive.effect: Lowers Scan cooldown by 50%. Increases attack and cast range of allies in a 1200 unit radius.

passive.name: Demolish
passive.effect: Deals bonus damage to buildings.

active.name: Cloak
active.effect: Causes you to become invisible for 6 seconds.

passive.name: Knockback
passive.effect: Knocks back enemies 50 distance and deals 50 pure damage with every attack.

active.effect: Summons 4 level 3 Necronomicon Units that last 75 seconds. Units have 100% more health and 50% more damage.

active.effect: Reset the cooldowns on all items (except Refresher Orb).

active.name: Fallen Sky

passive.name: Speed Unlock
passive.effect: Completely removes the speed limit for the wearer

passive.effect: Can path over any terrain and deals 100% of your strength per second to units you are standing ontop of.

passive.effect: Block and reflect most targeted spells back to their caster once every 8 seconds.
